data.title: Planet Lean
data.text:
Introducing the Lean Global Connection 2024

Roberto Priolo

Roberto

Priolo

EVENTÂ LAUNCH - Save the date!Â The Lean Global Connection 2024 will take place on November 21 and 22. In this article, our editor introduces the event's theme and tells us what attendees can expect from the largest online lean event in the world.

Continue reading

Jim Morgan
